book.synopsis: A decapitated corpse, found in a Paris canal, leads Inspector Maigret to visit the eccentric owner of a small bistro
book.title_long: Maigret and the Headless Corpse (English and French Edition)
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4 Inches, Weight: 0.3 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
